page.title: 15A DAY IN MY LIFE
page.content: Mum woke me at 7.30am. I had breakfast, when I had finished I got ready for school, Dad gave me a lift to school. I went into class,our first lesson was reading, then everyone had to do a cartoon or maths.After break the two top classes took assembly about the school journey. After lunch I went outside to play.In the afternoon we played rounders, did school journey work,had a break and a story. School finished at 4.00pm.I went home and had tea. After tea we went to the open evening at school where parents looked at our work and saw slides of the school journey to Derbyshire.We also enjoyed a piece of home-made Bakewell tart and coffee.After arriving home I watched T.V. and went to bed.
